common.apply-to-become-dj-or-see-how-it-works: Apply to become DJ or see how it works.
common.terms-message: By continuing you agree to our terms and conditions.
common.terms-message-event: By continuing you agree to our terms and conditions.
common.required-fields-error: Please fill out all required fields
common.Name: Name
common.reset-password-msg: We've just sent you an email to reset your password.
common.experience-description: How many gigs you have played using Cueup. This is shared on your public profile.
common.experience-description-public: How many gigs this DJ has played using Cueup.
common.earned-description: How much money you have earned. This is NOT shared on your public profile.
common.cueup-points-description: Cueup points can be used to remove the fee on gigs, thus increasing the payout.
common.not-found-description:
Sorry, the page you visited could not be found.
Try to spin up another page.
common.arrange-event-or-become-dj: Arrange an event, or apply to become a DJ.
See how it works, or arrange an event.
common.no-gigs-description: You will get a notification when new gigs are available.

payout.description-1: Choose what payout methods you want to use. You can always switch off methods when responding to a gig.
payout.description-direct: Fill out directions for the organizer to pay you. For example cash at the event, PayPal address, EAN number, or something else.
payout.address-description: Enter the address of the person or business that the bank account is associated with.
payout.IBAN-description: Your IBAN number can typically be found on your online bank, the banks mobile app or on your bank account statement.
payout.terms: By clicking save, you agree to our terms and conditions, and stripes connect account agreement.

common.No relevant DJ could be found: No relevant DJ could be found
common.Waiting on DJ's to make offers: Waiting on DJ's to make offers
common.The event is confirmed and payed: The event is confirmed and payed
common.site-description: Cueup is an online platform connecting DJs and event organizers - the easiest way for you to book a great DJ for your event.  Just tell us about your event, and within 1 day you will receive non-binding offers from DJs near you.
common.removed-facebook: To protect our users privacy, we have removed facebook as a login option. If you previously logged in using facebook, create a new password by clicking FORGOT.
common.payment-succes-message: The DJ has been booked, and you will receive a receipt on email.

public-profile.location: The DJ normally plays in this area.
public-profile.refund: Full refund if event is cancelled ${ days } or more days before it starts. Otherwise ${ percentage }% is refunded.

common.empty-reviews-own:
Ask your customers to leave a review.
It will help you get more gigs.
common.empty-reviews: This DJ does not have any reviews.
common.Appears after the offer is confirmed by: Appears after the offer is confirmed by the organizer.
common.cancel-event-warning: Are you sure you want to cancel the event?
common.Pay-method: When do you want to pay?
common.decline-warning: This will remove the DJ for ever, and you can't get in contact again.
common.event-description-placeholder:
What is the budget? 
What is the age of the guests? 
What kind of venue is it? 
Do you have any special requirements?
common.email-exists-message: It looks like there's already an account using that email. Please login or use a different email to continue.
common.post-event-succes-message: We'll send you an email to confirm the event.
common.post-event-succes-message-2: Would you like to receive notifications when you get a new offer?
